snippet: A Palestinian girl’s plea to Chancellor Angela Merkel of Germany put a human face to the dilemma of tens of thousands of migrants pouring into Europe.
abstract: German Chancellor Angela Merkel's response to Palestinian girl's plea to stay in Germany draws mixed reactions; some see Merkel's response as hard-hearted, while others say Merkel was just being honest in telling girl that not every migrant can stay.
lead_paragraph: A Palestinian girl’s plea to Chancellor Angela Merkel of Germany put a human face to the dilemma of tens of thousands of migrants pouring into Europe.

headline.main: Angela Merkel’s Encounter With a Teary Young Refugee Draws Mixed Reactions
headline.print_headline: Mixed Reviews of Answer in Tearful Plea to Merkel
